sentences.en: After consulting with her daughter and manager, she decided to take on the part, on her terms.
sentences.cn: 同她的女儿兼经纪人商量之后，她决定按她的要求接受那个角色。

sentences.en: He had to consult a pocket dictionary.
I can’t believe you sold the car without consulting me!
sentences.cn: 我真不敢相信你不和我商量一下就把车给卖了！
我得同委托人商量一下.

sentences.en: I wish to consult you on a few questions.
sentences.cn: 我有几个问题向您领教.

sentences.en: If symptoms persist, consult a doctor without delay.
sentences.cn: 如果症状持续的话，马上咨询医生。

sentences.en: If the pain continues, consult your doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果疼痛持续不消退，要请医生诊治。

sentences.en: If you are in any doubt, consult a financial adviser.
sentences.cn: 如有任何疑问，请向财务顾问咨询。

sentences.en: If you have no idea about it, consult a dictionary, please.
sentences.cn: 要是你对这个问题不清楚, 请你查字典得了.

sentences.en: If you require further information, you should consult the registrar.
sentences.cn: 如果需要进一步了解信息，请咨询教务主任。

sentences.en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

sentences.en: It is recommended that you should consult your doctor.
Parents can consult the teachers on children.
sentences.cn: 家长可以向老师询问孩子们的情况.

sentences.en: She began to consult doctors, and each had a different diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 她开始四处寻医，但每个医生的诊断都不相同。

sentences.en: The two countries will have to consult their allies.
sentences.cn: 两国不得不与盟国商议。

sentences.en: We consult a banker about our money.
sentences.cn: 我们向银行家询问我们的资金情况.

sentences.en: We have to consult his convenience in a matter of this kind.
sentences.cn: 对这样的事情,我们就听其自便吧.

words.tran_cn: 咨询；磋商；[临床] 会诊；讨论会

trans.tran_en: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something

trans.tran_cn: 交换意见， 商议； 当顾问
trans.tran_en: If a person or group of people consults with other people or consults them, or if two people or groups consult, they talk and exchange ideas and opinions about what they might decide to do

trans.tran_cn: 请教，找…商量；咨询；查阅，查看
trans.tran_en: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something
